text:
The river hongbao excursion is a worth trip for kids and parents. A lot of traditional costume and decoration related to CNY.
A great place to learn our traditions, thanks to all teachers for their explanation and efforts in the trip.

Recently my K2 child attended and perform at ChampsFest@Marina Square. I'm so proud of her! I would like to say a big Thank you to the school, her teachers and music teacher for such amazing performance. The activities there were fun and age appropriate and they had so much fun playing together. Well done YCK!

My son in PG class , he so enjoy the music class. Music teachers help them to try different kind of music instruments to have fun learning. Here have good variety of nutrition food, my son is very healthy grow up here, he like to sports and play.

Great school!
Thank you for creating such a warm and nurturing environment. Our daughter loves coming to school, and I can see how much she’s growing, both academically and socially.

We truly appreciate how patient and supportive you are with the kids. Isa speaks so highly of her teachers, and it’s clear she feels comfortable and encouraged to learn and explore.

Creativity in lesson planning really shines through and our daughter comes home excited about the activities and stories she shares, and it’s wonderful to see her so engaged.
It is a very well organised event - Zootopia....my boy had great fun. Thank you to all the staff for the great effort and hard work :)
